definitions.title: terr.
definitions.body: Medes, Media (OPers. Mâda Sp:APK, As. Madai COT:Gloss, and on Ge 10. 2 Dl:Par. 247);—

people, as ‘ son ’ of Japhet Ge 10:2 (P) = 1Ch 1:5; as hostile power Is 13:17, Is 21:2; [[זֶרַע מָדַי]] Da 9:1; land and people, [[מַלְכֵי מָדַי]] Je 25:25 (+ [[מַלְכֵי עֵילָם]]), Je 51:11, Je 51:28; [[וּפָרַס]] ´[[מַלְכֵי מ]] Da 8:20; cf. [[פָּרַס וּמָדַי]] Es 1:3, Es 1:14, Es 1:18, Es 1:19, Es 10:2; LXX Madai.
